oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: =kasin (Klaas Katkop) (IV)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The narrators adventure with a Leopard. In the Katkop dialect by =kasin (L IV.-1. 3458-3464). Later =kasin's father goes to hunt springbok to feed the family, but misfires with the gun and comes home empty-handed, to be scolded by his wife. 1) p.3457v: this incident occurred when =kasin was a married man living with his father, 2) This story is found in Book IV-1.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: =kasin's adventure with a leopard
